Fields.HelpText: The iteration within which this feature will be implemented
The area of the product with which this feature is associated
What the user will be able to do when this is implemented
The reason why the feature is in its current state
The person currently owning the feature
Description or acceptance criteria for this feature to be considered complete
Discussion thread plus automatic record of changes
The estimated effort to implemented the feature
Priority for completing the feature, based on business goals
The target date for completing the feature
The business value for the customer when the feature is released
Business = Services provided by the system to fulfill stakeholder needs; Architectural = Technical system services to implement business features that deliver solution value
How does the business value decay over time. Higher values make the feature more time critical
The current state of the work request
A coarse sizing estimation for total effort, including all involved activities (XS <=  half day. XXL > several months).
Any special or unusual conditions
This is entered by the approver or pulled from another system.
